name: Cyber Blast (Bardon)
description:
You are teleported in a spaceship which is flying amongst the stars. On the spaceship are aliens which shoot at  you when you are to close. But: You have a gun, the ammo is limited. You must search the levels for medikit, ammo - and the keycard which opens the door to the next level.

Moving is with w, a, s and d,  with mouse you look around and shoot. With shift-key you run.

In the gam is fantastic horror-music

(bugfixed on 08.06.22)
